p: The values were expressed as the mean ± SEM. Statistical analysis was performed with two-way ANOVA followed by Bonferroni's test. Results were considered nonsignificant (∗) if P < 0.05, significant (∗∗) if P < 0.01, and highly significant (∗∗∗) if P < 0.001. The data was compiled and statistically analyzed by using GraphPad Prism version 5.
